definition: A vertical structure that separates or encloses spaces, typically made of solid material, often used to support or divide areas within a building or to provide privacy. It is commonly found in architectural contexts and serves as a fundamental element in constructing interior spaces.

examples.german: Ich hänge ein Bild an die Wand.
examples.english: I hang a picture on the wall.

examples.german: Er lehnt sich gegen die Wand.

examples.english: The wall is made of stone.
